text: The 2013 Tour of Chongming Island is a stage race held in China, with a UCI rating of 2.1. It was the eighth stage race of the 2013 Women's Elite cycling calendar. ==Stages== ===Stage 1=== ;8 May 2013 — Chongbei, {| |- || || |} ===Stage 2=== ;9 May 2013 — Chong West, {| |- || || |} ===Stage 3=== ;10 May 2013 — Chongming, {| |- || || |} ==References== ==External links== Category:2013 in women's road cycling Category:2013 in Chinese sport Category:Tour of Chongming Island
title: 2013 Tour of Chongming Island
